api-keys-description: Every service token is specific to you, a certain project and a certain environment within this project.

add-dialog.title: Add an API Key
add-dialog.description: Specify the name and expiry period. When an API key is generated, you will only be able to see it once before it disappears. Make sure to save it somewhere.
add-dialog.name: API Key Name
add-dialog.copy-service-token-description: Once you close this popup, you will never see your API key again
